content:
In R4, ServiceRequest (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/servicerequest.html) defines these code values for status: draft | active |suspended| completed | entered-in-error | cancelled
The documentation also points to this valueset: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-request-status.html
This valueset has a different and partially overlapping set of code values:
draft|active|on-hold|revoked|completed|entered-in-error|unknown

The differences are shown above in italics. Which is the correct valueset to use with ServiceRequest?
has been fixed in the current ( ci ) build
